Package com.stahocorp.etlprocess.transform

Class FileFlow

java.lang.Object
com.stahocorp.etlprocess.transform.FileFlow
public class FileFlow
extends java.lang.Object
Defines flow of a file through parsers This class takes filePath of file which should be parsed into json object. Several things happen, such as parsing file name and processing given html input.

    • processFile

      public static java.lang.String processFile​(java.nio.file.Path filePath) throws java.io.IOException
      Parameters:
      filePath - path to processed file
      Returns:
      file as json object
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs reading from the stream

    • prepareOpinionsJson

      private static java.lang.String prepareOpinionsJson​(java.util.List<OpinionItem> opinions)
      This method is used to serialize list of opinions items to json.
      Parameters:
      opinions - opinion about product
      Returns:
      opinions as json object String

    • prepareInfoJson

      private static java.lang.String prepareInfoJson​(InfoItem infoItem)
      This method is used to serialize product info items to json object.
      Parameters:
      infoItem - product information from reseller site
      Returns:
      product info as a Json object string

    • createFileAndSaveString

      public static void createFileAndSaveString​(java.lang.String content, java.nio.file.Path outputDirPath, java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String timeStamp) throws java.io.IOException
      This method is used to save output json object string into a new file. It changes output file name due to replication in case of reprocessing.
      Parameters:
      content - json object(s) to save
      outputDirPath - path of output folder (defined in application.properties)
      filename - name of original file
      timeStamp - combination of hour, minutes and seconds of processing.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
